data.title: Kinda not related but I write a novel about M1 Abrams Isekai
data.meta_description: Hello I’m a Light Novel author and I write a novel with M1 abrams that transported into another world. I don’t have first hand experience with that tank but I do some little research and I hope it is accurate enough lol.…
data.text:
Hello I’m a Light Novel author and I write a novel with M1 abrams that transported into another world. I don’t have first hand experience with that tank but I do some little research and I hope it is accurate enough lol. So if you’re interested reading my book I will provide a link for that. I need your insight on how can I improve it and even if its so highly fictional, I will make it realistic as possible. https://www.webnovel.com/book/transported-into-another-world-with-my-m1-abrams-tank_28467738900865205[M1 ABRAMS ISEKAI WN LINK]

Yep, that would be the challenges that need to overcome by the mc later on. Maybe I will put some magical things on it but still make it technical.

And I don’t have a chat bot
